text:
On RT at 5.15. To discuss.... THAT NHS advert. 
The one where Mr Claus gets Covid. 
I'm with @emmakennytv who seems like a good egg.
So, what do we think?
Good message to send or in poor taste?
#NHSheroes #Santa #COVID19 #CovidChristmas2020 #waleslockdown #vaccine #antivaxxers https://t.co/Jvc5GJizRf
